title: Add tooltips for External tools
author: JRVcr
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
I use External Tools for web consoles that run against selected computers in the left pane. I'm an IT consultant with multiple clients where the consoles are on different hosts but otherwise have the same URL; this is much faster than saving Connections for each web console for each client.

This also means I just get generic icons in the ET toolbar and have to rely on the labels for identification. Because I have a lot of them, I use lower-case abbreviations to keep the ...
